content: i used 5 ply cotton yarn and 3mm hook this pattern also works for 4 ply yarns and 2 5mm hook for 5 ply yarns the final size is about 8cm w x 10cm h x 9cm d you only need to know some basic crochet skills like single_crochet single_crochet crochet increase increase slip_stitch slip_stitch and also how to change yarn colors during crochet i have created video tutorial on youtube you can search crochelah on youtube to watch step by step instructions
